column16: 12. Write here your remarks about the game: which feature was missing, what failed or glitched, what was great:
It is a nice game.
Easy to play, innovative game.
It is an easy innovative game.
Visuals are nice
I think, there should be levels in the game. Start with just 1 sick person to keep healthy and then go on increasing the level to keeping 3 persons healthy.
The cursor is too cumbersome to move in the game, could not keep the syringe at the exact place. when pressed one of the antibiotic, syringe moved one position left.

This game was absolutely good but the time of food regenration was a little more and with antibiotics a few times only the good bacteria and virus gets kiled which affects the health of the person very much.
This is a very good game and is very easy to play and also can be a way to educate people that the type of disease is only cured by certain drugs

This game was a very nice one in spreading awareness that it takes time to heel from a strong bacteria and we have also to care about the small precautions of saving ourself from time to time from diseases . Altough it was a very simple game but very interesting one also.
i didnt get it
same colour antibiotics used to kill same colour fungi made it easy to play

overall good to play, maybe features can be

interesting but a bit complex
easy to play

The game was very well made and served the purpose. It was easy to use. However, I am sure most kids would find this game boring and wont be playing it more than once. Though, playing it once is enough to give the person a basic understanding about microbes.
This game was poorly made. Even though it was clear what the game was trying to indicate, It was laggy and very shabbily designed. The objective is simple, but the game in itself is bad.
The game was very well made. It was intuitive and easy to play. Simple to understand and well designed. The game would most certainly catch the eye, and possibly played again.
according to me as a student, this game is not of any use.. We have not been told that what is the purpose of this game. we don't know why we are playing it.
It was simply a fun. As i have played 2 more games before. so this become quite easy.
i don't know what is the need of playing this game.
instructions need to be well formulated
it can be made more systematic
The game was quiet interesting but i found the revival of healthy food or pills take times and we need it continuously throughout the game.
the ratio of antibiotic effect and healthy diet on a particular system should be mentioned while playing game
score of not killed vs killed fungal invaders should also be mentioned , but really a nice game
survival threat  indication at the end was nice
game is good but there should be other options to kill that bacteria because waiting for medicine takes lot of time to kill that bacteria and ultimately led to lose us game.
it was great among all
this game is so annyoning.
Very easy to play
easy to play
easy to play

The game was interesting and quite confusing at first but as i started playing i was able to understand and it would be informative for teenagers who lack knowledge about bacteria and virus and especially about intake of healthy food .
It was okay
I definitely found the game really complex and i was confused but it was a little informative not much of an information was there but yes was fine.
The game was really very simple and yet explained the concept of the game really nicely. The hints can be improved. The graphics can be improved.
The syringe movement function is really very cumbersome sometimes. Overall I liked it.
This game was amazing.I liked its graphics and its easy functioning. It was even better than Dr Bug: Microbe Mayhem.
Great
Great
Great

The game is simple and apt to make a layman understand the harmful effects of antibiotics.The instructions could be in form of text supporting the audio in the intro section. While playing the game the effects of actions made by the player could also be in form of text.
The instructions on how to choose the type of antibiotics for the type of fungal pathogens were not clear.The game could have been more user friendly.
This game was very much up to the mark in all its features and in the basic understanding of development of resistant species of bacteria and their harmful effects in generations to come.
The instructions were not very clear
accent
The background sound was not nice but the message was delivered well
Amazing Game. Well explained natural selection among bacteria.
excellent game easy to access of newbies

Beautiful idea to spread the fact that bacteria are our freinds as well as foe. There should be screen representing the icons that facilitates further in playing the game. There should be some means to share if a player is playing good or bad
It is a fabulous game to teach the kids about the specificity of antibiotics against antigens. I liked it most.
It was ok but not that fascinating.

different types of diet which can restore the healthy gut bacteria can be included as eating fruits is not the only way to do so and also lifestyle changes associated with maintaining good gut health can make the game more interesting and a little complex, thus fun to play.
